pr_title: CLDR-13954 Make sure child SEED locales are included.

timeline.message: CLDR-13954 Make sure child SEED locales are included.

timeline.bodyText:
Sets.difference(es.getRawExtraPaths(), es_US.getRawExtraPaths()) perhaps?
It's use the ordering of the first set, so maybe not ordered the same.
timeline.author: hagbard

timeline.bodyText:
Maybe use an enum over a boolean here (readability).
supplementalData.getGrammarInfo(cldrFile.getLocaleID(), ALL_LOCALES)
seems to read better than:
supplementalData.getGrammarInfo(cldrFile.getLocaleID(), false)
timeline.author: hagbard

replies.bodyText: This is temporary, since we'll be removing SEED next release. Did make a few other changes for simplicity
replies.author: macchiati

timeline.message: CLDR-13954 clean up code a bit.
